doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records

This subseries contains Artist Fellowship Program materials, press releases, artists surveys, and final reports detailing the program for a given fiscal year and the list of fellow recipients based on artistic discipline. NYFA disciplines include playwriting, video, photography, fiction, poetry, painting, architecture, music composition, choreography, computer arts, sculpture, crafts, and film. Included are panelist information and voting records documenting the selection process of artists across disciplines. This subseries also includes development files for fellows' events, such as a NYFA Painting Fellows Exhibition or "A Community Grows" Film Screening, as well as materials from the Board of Governors including meeting notes, questionnaires, and retreat meeting materials in order to further develop initiatives, budgets, goals.
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
